changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `express_send_b2c_cod` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `customerid` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `datajson` text, `state` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `cretime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `posttime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `cwb_index` (`cwb`), KEY `b2c_customerid_idx` (`customerid`), KEY `b2c_state_idx` (`state`), KEY `b2c_posttime_idx` (`posttime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `express_send_b2c_filecount` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `filecount` bigint(11) DEFAULT '1', `type` bigint(4) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `express_send_b2c_cod` ADD COLUMN `deliverystate` INT(4) DEFAULT 0 NULL AFTER `remark`; ALTER TABLE `express_send_b2c_cod` CHANGE `customerid` `customerid` INT(4) DEFAULT 0 NULL, CHANGE `state` `state` INT(4) DEFAULT 0 NULL;

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE `ops_delivery_successful` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `branchid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `deliveryid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `deliverystate` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `cwbordertypeid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `customerid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `deliverystateid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `paywayid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `deliverytime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `audittime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `auditstate` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `receivablefee` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `paybackfee` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `success_cwb_idx` (`cwb`), KEY `success_branchid_idx` (`branchid`), KEY `success_deliveryid_idx` (`deliveryid`), KEY `success_deliverytime_idx` (`deliverytime`), KEY `success_audittime_idx` (`audittime`), KEY `success_customerid_idx` (`customerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE `set_download_manager` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` bigint(11) DEFAULT NULL, `datajson` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `modelid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `createtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `state` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `filename` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `fileurl` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `timeout` bigint(11) DEFAULT '-1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: zhangpengkai
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `express_b2cdata_search` ( `b2cid` BIGINT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `customerid` int DEFAULT NULL, `cretime` VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL, `flowordertype` INT(4) DEFAULT NULL, `content` VARCHAR(300) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` VARCHAR(300) DEFAULT NULL, `operatorname` VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `b2cid` (`b2cid`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; ALTER TABLE `express_b2cdata_search` ADD INDEX `cwbindex` (`cwb`);

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `commen_cwb_order` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `customerid` bigint(11) DEFAULT NULL, `startbranchid` bigint(11) DEFAULT NULL, `commencode` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `credate` varchar(20) DEFAULT '', `stateTime` varchar(20) DEFAULT '', `emaildateid` bigint(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `commencode_time_idx` (`commencode`,`stateTime`), KEY `emaildateid_idx` (`emaildateid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `common_emaildate` ( `emaildateid` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `commoncode` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `cwbcount` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `emaildate` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emaildateid`), KEY `emaildate_idx` (`emaildate`), KEY `commoncode_idx` (`commoncode`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=42 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: zhangjianbao
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` ( `cwbid` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '订单ID', `paywayid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '原支付方式', `newpaywayid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '现支付方式', `customerid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '供应商ID', `cwbordertypeid` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '订单类型', `receivablefee` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '代收货款应收金额', `paybackfee` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上门退货应退金额', `branchid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '当前站点', `deliverybranchid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '配送站点', `nextbranchid` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '下一站', `deliverystate` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '交付状态', `cwbstate` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' COMMENT '订单状态', `gobackstate` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '归班状态', `emaildatetime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '发货时间', `couplebacktime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '反馈时间#', `checktime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '审核时间#', `customerbacktime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '供应商退货时间@', `tuihuointowarehoustime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '退货站入库时间#', `changeouttowarehoustime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '中转站出库时间#', `housetohousetime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '库对库出库时间#', `getgoodstime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '提货时间#', `intowarehoustime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '入库时间#', `outwarehousetime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '出库时间#', `substationgoodstime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '到货扫描时间#', `receivegoodstime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分站领货时间#', `returngoodsoutwarehousetime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '退货出站扫描时间#', `changeintowarehoustime` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '中转站入库时间#', PRIMARY KEY (`cwbid`), KEY `tail_cwb_emaildatetime` (`emaildatetime`) USING BTREE, KEY `tail_cwb_couplebacktime` (`couplebacktime`), KEY `tail_cwb_customerbacktime` (`customerbacktime`), KEY `tail_cwb_checktime` (`checktime`), KEY `tail_cwb_tuihuointowarehoustime` (`tuihuointowarehoustime`), KEY `tail_cwb_changeouttowarehoustime` (`changeouttowarehoustime`), KEY `tail_cwb_housetohousetime` (`housetohousetime`), KEY `tail_cwb_getgoodstime` (`getgoodstime`), KEY `tail_cwb_intowarehoustime` (`intowarehoustime`), KEY `tail_cwb_outwarehousetime` (`outwarehousetime`), KEY `tail_cwb_substationgoodstime` (`substationgoodstime`), KEY `tail_cwb_receivegoodstime` (`receivegoodstime`), KEY `tail_cwb_returngoodsoutwarehousetime` (`returngoodsoutwarehousetime`), KEY `tail_cwb_changeintowarehoustime` (`changeintowarehoustime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` CHANGE `cwbid` `cwb` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT '' NULL COMMENT '订单号', DROP PRIMARY KEY; ALTER TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` ADD COLUMN `id` BIGINT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT FIRST, ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`);

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` ADD COLUMN `flowordertype` BIGINT(11) DEFAULT 1 NULL AFTER `changeintowarehoustime`, ADD COLUMN `zhandianouttozhongzhuantime` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '' NULL AFTER `flowordertype`, ADD COLUMN `tuihuoouttozhandiantime` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '' NULL AFTER `zhandianouttozhongzhuantime`, ADD COLUMN `gonghuoshangchenggongtime` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '' NULL AFTER `tuihuoouttozhandiantime`, ADD COLUMN `gonghuoshangjushoutime` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '' NULL AFTER `gonghuoshangchenggongtime`;
ALTER TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` ADD INDEX `tail_cwb_zhandianouttozhongzhuantime` (`zhandianouttozhongzhuantime`), ADD INDEX `tail_cwb_tuihuoouttozhandiantime` (`tuihuoouttozhandiantime`), ADD INDEX `tail_cwb_gonghuoshangchenggongtime` (`gonghuoshangchenggongtime`);

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `commen_cwb_order_tail` ADD INDEX `tail_cwb_Idx` (`cwb`);

changeSet.author: zhangpengkai
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `express_b2cdatadown_sf` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `transcwb` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `cretime` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `updatetime` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(4) DEFAULT '0', `remark` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `isok` int(4) DEFAULT '0', KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `sf_cwb_idx` (`cwb`), KEY `sf_status_idx` (`status`), KEY `sf_isok_idx` (`isok`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: lansheng
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `express_ops_b2c_amazon_ziti` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cwb` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `daohuotime` varchar(20) DEFAULT '', `customerid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `state` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', `branchid` bigint(11) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `Ziti_Cwb_Idx` (`cwb`), KEY `Ziti_createtime_Idx` (`createtime`), KEY `Ziti_Branchid_Idx` (`branchid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `express_b2cdata_wangjiu` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mailNo` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `orderStatus` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `acceptTime` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `acceptAddress` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `flowordertype` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
